runs.comm: good length outside off stump with some movement away from the right-hander, Gibbs lets the ball pass through to Ronchi
tight line and length on off stump, Gibbs stays in his crease and defends towards point
Bracken pitches outside leg stump, Gibbs gets down on one knee and tries to paddle past fine leg, he doesn't make contact
lbw!! Bracken bowls a full ball, Gibbs tries to flick off the front foot but misses and gets hit on the pad. The impact was outside leg stump, Gibbs is unlucky
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot
Bracken pitches a good length ball around off stump and gets it to move into the right-hander, de Villiers defends
wide outside off stump and de Villiers chases it but doesn't make contact, Bracken finishes an outstanding over
that was 152 kmh! Kallis barely has time to duck under the bouncer, the ball was extremely close to the glove, it lobbed up to slip, it may have been off the glove!
155 kmh!! Kallis manages to work it off his pads behind square

de Villiers is in pain! And he's out! Tait bowls a short of a length ball at 155.6 kmh, de Villiers tries to pull but is beaten by the pace of the ball, it crashes into his hip off the bottom edge and he winces in pain, he loses balance as he moves back and the bat hits the stumps, he's in a lot of pain and he hobbles back to the dug out, I hope he isn't badly injured
151kmh, Duminy plays the ball off his pads behind square
Tait fires in a straight ball, it isn't that short but Kallis swivels and manages to pull the ball powerfully through square leg
153.2 kmh, Kallis hits the full ball into the ground and it goes towards slip. Tait finishes  a seriously fast over
good length ball outside off stump, Duminy lets it go
145 kmh on middle and off, Duminy stands in his crease and hits through the line, he lofts the ball over mid-on for four
Duminy nudges the ball off his pads behind square
good length outside off stump from Hilfenhaus, Kallis stays on the back foot and pushes towards cover point

bowled him! Kallis charges and makes room to hit down the ground, he misses and Hilfenhaus hits the top of off stump, that ball moved off the pitch a touch, Hilfenhaus does look a bit like Harmison, South Africa are in loads of trouble
van Jaarsveld pokes at a good length delivery outside off and gets beaten
149.3 kmh, that's his slowest ball so far, Duminy moves back and pushes towards mid-off
150.7 kmh, that's a sharp bouncer and Duminy just manages to duck under it
full and wide outside off stump, Duminy leans forward and plays a lovely cover drive for four, superb timing and placement
that's quick, 150kmh, Duminy gets into position quickly and pulls the ball through backward square leg for four, he didn't move his feet too much, he didn't have time to
that's too wide down leg side, Ronchi moves to his right to collect
another one down leg side, Tait will have to rebowl that
short and wide outside off stump, Duminy stands tall on the back foot, gets on top of the bounce, and lofts the ball over cover, he can play!
driven off the front foot towards mid-off
van Jaarsveld gets off the mark by pushing off the front foot towards third man
Duminy moves forward to a length ball and drives dead straight, Hilfenhaus can't get down quickly enough and that's four
full ball outside off, Duminy gets beaten
low full toss outside off stump, Duminy jams his bat down and hits the ball hard into the ground behind him, it bounces over the keeper and goes for four!
played to midwicket
Hilfenhaus bowls a full ball on off stump, Duminy stays in his crease and drives to cover
short of a length on leg stump, played off the hips behind square
slower ball outside off stump, Duminy waits for it and dabs to short third man
lovely placement from van Jaarsveld, he goes on to the back foot and drives a good length ball between point and cover
Duminy leans across and flicks a full ball off his pads behind square
David Hussey leaps to his right at point and stops a hard cut from Duminy, that would have been four had it got past
another slower ball, van Jaarsveld pushes off the front foot towards mid-on
good length outside off stump, van Jaarsveld moves forward and pushes towards mid-off
Duminy moves forward and taps a short of a length ball towards midwicket
van Jaarsveld moves back and nudges the ball towards mid-on for one more
Duminy makes room and drives a length ball on the up through cover
van Jaarsveld knocks the ball into the gap at extra cover and runs a single, South Africa need more boundaries
and Duminy gives them one by pulling a short ball to the deep midwicket boundary
he goes round the wicket and bowls a quick ball outside off, van Jaarsveld lets it go
nudged on the front foot towards the off side for one, Ronchi runs over to field
he strays down leg side this time, that's wide
van Jaarsveld tries to sweep but misses, he gets hit on the pad outside off
bowled full on middle and leg, Duminy taps it towards mid-on for one
van Jaarsveld knocks the ball towards midwicket for one more
Duminy moves back to a flat and fast ball outside off and cuts towards the third-man boundary, the ball doesn't make it but Duminy will get three
a low full toss and Duminy drives towards long off for a single
short of a length on middle stump, van Jaarsveld drives the ball into the ground and back at Hopes who gets a hand on to it, he knocks it on to Duminy
driven to long on for  a single
another full toss and Duminy drives the ball straight past the bowler, lovely timing but he won't get four for it

caught! Hopes bowls a length ball angled into the left-handers pads, van Jaarsveld hits the ball in the air towards midwicket but he's placed it straight to White who takes a comfortable catch at head height
Hopes ends the over with a bouncer, it's only 128 kmh compared to Tait's fearsome offerings, Boucher ducks under it
Duminy moves back and cuts towards backward point for a single, there's an overthrow at the bowler's end but Boucher has run too far past the stumps at the batsman's end to take advantage
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Duminy tries to drive through cover but gets a thick edge through point
that's a bit short but it's quick, 104 kmh from the offspinner, Duminy mis-hits towards cover
Boucher moves back and makes room to dab the ball towards short third man
short and wide outside off stump, Duminy moves back and cuts toward deep cover
Boucher moves back to flick but misses and gets hit on the thigh, they steal the single
the slower ball on off stump, Duminy nudges towards extra cover and sets off, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but Duminy is already past the stumps
Boucher cuts off the back foot behind point
full ball on leg and middle, Duminy leans across and flicks the ball through square leg, that's his 50, off only 31 balls, well played!
Duminy flicks another full ball through midwicket
shot! Boucher moves forward and drives a full ball straight past the bowler, Warner runs to his left from long-on and dives to cut off the boundary
played off the back foot towards point

that is some catch! Boucher charges down the track and lofts David Hussey towards deep midwicket, his brother Michael is in the deep and he pedals backwards and never takes his eyes off the ball, the ball is virtually past him when he reaches up and holds it while moving backwards, superb catch
cut off the back foot through point for a single
Albie stays on the back foot and cuts through point
bowled flat and fast outside off, Duminy cuts through point again
that's too far down leg side, Morkel misses the sweep
pushed off the front foot towards extra cover. Hussey is zipping through his overs
Hopes bowls a yorker and Duminy doesn't know where the ball has gone after he manages to dig it out
full toss on middle stump, Duminy makes room and drives through cover
Hopes sends down a bouncer at 129 kmh but the length is too short and the ball sails over the batsman's head
Hope bowls a good length ball on middle and off stump, Morkel stays in his crease and dabs the ball from his stumps towards third man
Duminy picks a full ball off his pads and lofts towards the deep midwicket boundary, rapid bat speed

White's lost it in the lights! Duminy hit the ball in the air down to long-on, White ran to his left and got to the ball but then stopped after losing sight of it, the ball bounced hear him and went for four
nudged off the pads for a single

oh my goodness! That is the most bizarre shot I've seen in a while! Tait bowled a quick ball at 150 kmh on middle stump, Duminy moved across his stumps, got under the bounce and scooped it over the wicketkeeper's head for six!
Tait didn't like the previous shot and he replies with a fierce bouncer, Duminy ducks
full and straight, Duminy drives the ball past mid-off, Hilfenhaus gives chase
slower ball from Tait, Duminy hits the ball through midwicket
Duminy smashes the ball flat towards long-on for a single, it reached Hilfenhaus on one bounce

that will be five! Morkel nudges the ball towards David Hussey at point and sets off for the single, Hussey throws at the bowler's end and the ball deflects off Morkel's bat and goes to the long-on boundary
Morkel cuts the ball in the air but through the gap at backward point for four, third man is in the circle and it was wide of Tait at backward point
Morkel slogs the ball in the air towards long-on and it falls short of David Hussey
Duminy lines up a length delivery and pulls it in the air, the ball falls short of the fielder at deep square leg, this time it's Michael Hussey
Bracken bowls a cutter and gets it to bounce a bit more, Morkel tries to cut but gets beaten
caught! The lights are not in White's eyes this time! Morkel gets under a length ball and hits it hard, flat and straight to White at deep midwicket, he takes the catch comfortably
short ball, Duminy moves across and pulls the ball gently behind square
Botha tries to reverse sweep his first ball but can't get it past short third man

lbw! Duminy' gone! He tried to reverse sweep a delivery angling into him from round the wicket, it was the quicker one from Hussey and Duminy missed it, the ball hit him on the pad right in front of the stumps, that's probably the end of South Africa's challenge tonight
driven firmly off the front foot past the bowler
Steyn's gone too! He tries to hit on the on side but the leading edge falls into Bracken's hands at short third man
driven down the ground for a single
Hilfenhaus bowls a superb yorker on middle stump and the batsman just manages to dig it out behind square
bowled him! Hilfenhaus sends down another yorker and gets it to swing into Ntini's boot, Ntini loses balance as the ball thuds into his shoe and goes on to hit the stumps
full toss on middle stump, the batsman just manages to play it to midwicket
Tsotsobe manages to keep out another yorker
Hilfenhaus follows up the yorkers with a bouncer, Tsotsobe ducks in a hurry
is that an edge? There's a half appeal from the Australians. Tsotsobe stuck his bat out and missed the ball, i don't think it hit anything
full ball on middle stump, Botha swings his bat hard and hits the ball behind square
Tait bowls a yorker outside off stump, Tsotsobe defends and then decides to run even though the ball is near his crease, he has to hurry back after Tait runs towards the ball
Tait's aiming for the base of middle, the ball is on target until Tsotsobe brings his bat down and plays it to midwicket
banged in short outside off stump, Botha lets it go
Tait bowls a full ball slanting into the pads and hits Botha, he appeals for lbw but that was missing leg, the ball goes towards short third man and they run a leg bye
bowled him! Tait sends down another yorker, this time the ball smacks Tsotsobe on the pads outside the line of leg stump and then bounces on to the stumps
